94108.「ここから門を出て 街道を北に進むと\n 獅子門という 大きな集落に出る。\n<:
From here, exit the gate and continue north along the road to a large village called Lion Gate. If you continue along the road, you will
reach Rangao Village, a village where Ogre live. If you have never been there, it is worth a visit.

94109.「自分は 行商人のオグバンという。\n 以後 よろしく頼む。\n<br>\n「自:
My name is Ogban, a peddler. I am Ogban, a peddler. My job is to transport goods from Glen Castle Town to various places with this
wagon. I am heading to Rangao Village from now on, and if you like, I can give you a ride to that area.

94110.「これから ランガーオ村へ向かうのだが\n よければ その辺りまで 乗せていくぞ:
I'm on my way to Rangao Village now, and I can
give you a ride to that area if you like.<bw_break>

94111.「自分は 行商人のオグバンという。\n 以後 よろしく頼む。\n<br>\n「自:
My name is Ogban, a peddler. I am Ogban, a peddler. My job is to transport goods from Glen Castle Town to various places by wagon. I
am on my way to Lion Gate now, and if you like, I can give you a ride there.

94112.「これから 獅子門へ向かうのだが\n よければ そこまで 乗せていくぞ。<bw_:
I'm on my way to Lion Gate now, and if you
don't mind, I can give you a ride there.<bw_break>

94113.<pipipi_low>「……む。すまない。\n 今 そこへ向かうのは 少々都合:
Mm. I'm sorry. It's just not a good time for us to be heading out there right now. I'll give you your money back. Please take
advantage of it again after some time.

94114.「ただし 送るのみで 迎えには行けん。\n それでも よければ どこまで行く？\:
But I can only drop you off. I can't pick you
up. Even so, if you don't mind, where would
you like to go?

94117.<pipipi_low>「おまちどおさん。\n 獅子門に 到着したぞ。\n では:
<pipipi_low>Hello, ladies and gentlemen. We have arrived
at Lion Gate. Well then, farewell.

129201.「自分は 行商人のオグバンという。\n 以後 よろしく頼む。\n<br>\n「自:
My name is Ogban, a peddler. I am Ogban, a peddler. My job is to transport goods from Glen Castle Town to various places with this
wagon. I am heading to Bridge Inn via Rangao Village, and if you like, I can give you a ride there.

129203.「これから ランガーオ村を経由して\n 橋上の宿へ向かうのだが\n よければ そ:
I'm on my way to Bridge Inn via Rangao
Village, and if you want, I can give you a
ride there.<bw_break>

148171.「おっと。乗らないのか。そいつは残念だ。\n どこかに行きたくなったら また来い:
Oops. You're not getting in? That's too bad.
Come back if you want to go somewhere.

148172.「まいど ありがとう\n ではすぐに 出発するぞ。: Thank you very much. We'll be leaving soon.

148173.「おっと。残念だが お金が足りないな。\n それじゃ 乗せてやることはできん。\:
Oops. I'm sorry, but we're short on money.
Then I can't give you a ride. Please come back
with the money.

148174.「おっと。そりゃ 失礼したな。\n どこかに行きたくなったら また来いよ。:
Oops. Well, that's rude. Come again if you
want to go somewhere.

148176.「<%sL_TIMEI>まで\n 行くんだな。\n <%nL_GOLD>ゴールド:
You're going to <%sL_TIMEI>. <%nL_GOLD>I'll
take the gold, okay?
